tilsim.simulator.draw_clues(ax)
tilsim.simulator.draw_robot(ax, refs=None, draw_noisy=False)

Draw robot on given axes.

Parameters:

  • refs – Matplotlib refs to previously draw robot.

  • draw_noisy (bool) – Draw robot with simulated noise.

Returns:

Matplotlib refs to drawn robot.

Return type:

new_refs
